name: Madalyn Down Jacket With Removable Hood - Women's

features: Adjustable visor in hood with drawcord
Zippered pockets with 3D zipper stopper cover
FITTED – Our signature fit, closest to the body.
Designed to be worn with light layers, all while keeping you warm.
For heavier layering, we recommend sizing up.
Coat length from shoulder to hem: 24 1/2" / 62,2 cm
Filling: 90/10 duck down / feathers Pekin Duck (Anas Platyrhynchos Domesticus).

Water washing with a maximum temperature of 30ºc in washing machine with delicate cycle. Remove the leather from the cursor. low temperature bulk drying with tennis balls. Do not bleach / do not wring. Do not iron or press.
